title: Apple Leaf Disease Detection
description: This is my minor project. I built an web app that can predict the diseases of an apple leaf.

title: House Price Prediction
description: A machine learning model that predicts house prices based on various features.

title: Book Recommender System
description: A recommendation system that suggests books based on user preferences and ratings.

title: Laptop Price Predictor
description: Predicts laptop prices using machine learning based on user-provided specifications.

title: Vehicle Detection
description: Detects and counts vehicles in video feeds using OpenCV and Python.

title: Autism Spectrum Disorder Prediction
description: Built an ML model (Random Forest/XGBoost) to predict Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD). Preprocessed data (median imputation, SMOTE), achieving 92% validation and 82% test accuracy
